name: Vesper
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bacardi
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Negroni
steps: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Rose
steps: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Old Fashioned
steps: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.

name: Tuxedo
steps: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Mojito
steps: Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

name: Horse's Neck
steps: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

name: Planter's Punch
steps: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.

name: Sea Breeze
steps: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

name: Pisco Sour
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
steps: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

name: Clover Club
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Angel Face
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mimosa
steps: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

name: Whiskey Sour
steps: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Screwdriver
steps: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Cuba Libre
steps: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Manhattan
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Porto Flip
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Gin Fizz
steps: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

ingredients.name: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

name: Espresso Martini
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Margarita
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

name: French 75
steps: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

name: Yellow Bird
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pina Colada
steps: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

name: Aviation
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bellini
steps: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

name: Grasshopper
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tequila Sunrise
steps: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

name: Daiquiri
steps: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Rusty Nail
steps: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: B52
steps: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

name: Stinger
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Golden Dream
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: God Mother
steps: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Spritz Veneziano
steps: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

name: Bramble
steps: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

name: Alexander
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

name: French Martini
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

name: Black Russian
steps: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

name: Bloody Mary
steps: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.

name: Mai-tai
steps: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.

name: Sex on the Beach
steps: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Monkey Gland
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Derby
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sidecar
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Irish Coffee
steps: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

name: Sazerac
steps: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

name: Americano
steps: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.

name: Singapore Sling
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.

name: French Connection
steps: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

ingredients.name: 1 slice lime in a highball glass

name: Moscow Mule
steps: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.

name: John Collins
steps: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

name: Kir
steps: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

name: Mint Julep
steps: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.

name: Tommy's Margarita
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Paradise
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dirty Martini
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Champagne Cocktail
steps: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.

name: Mary Pickford
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway Special
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
steps: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.

name: Ramos Fizz
steps: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

name: Russian Spring Punch
steps: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.

name: God Father
steps: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Cosmopolitan
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Dry Martini
steps: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

name: Between the Sheets
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Casino
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

ingredients.name: half fresh lime cut into 4 wedges

name: Caipirinha
steps: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

ingredients.name: Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers

name: Vampiro
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.

name: Kamikaze
steps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: White Lady
steps: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
steps: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.
